title: Ep. #9 | Catching Up: Tablo of Epik High
description:
2019 has been a BIG year for Tablo and Epik High. Let’s recap: Epik High independently released their chart topping album #sleeplessin___________, toured in both Europe and North America (25 shows in 24 cities), played festivals and shows across Korea, and are now gearing up for tours in Australia, China, and Southeast Asia this summer. While this rap god & genius is busy with all of these activities, he still manages to be a fantastic father and husband at the same time. We @daebakshow are stoked to have Tablo on this week’s episode and hope you enjoy it as much as we did. Make sure to subscribe and follow us on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Soundcloud, and YouTube. #epikhigh #tablo #sleeplessin__________ #ericnam #daebakshow.  As always, if you enjoy this podcast, make sure to subscribe and leave us a comment / rating on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Soundcloud and YouTube. It helps us tremendously :). Thank you for listening, Daebak Show family! Connect with us on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook @daebakshow. Join our exclusive mailing list at www.daebakshow.com and be the first to know about new episodes, giveaways, special events, and other random things we have planned for you guys!
 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
